tool_description: Builds correlation matrix between portfolio assets to identify diversification opportunities and concentration risks.

asset_symbols.description: List of asset ticker symbols for correlation analysis

analysis_period_months.description: Historical period for correlation calculation in months

correlation_threshold.description: Correlation threshold for flagging high correlations

error_messages: Insufficient assets: At least 2 assets required for correlation analysis.
Invalid period: Analysis period must be between 6 and 120 months.
Invalid threshold: Correlation threshold must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Data unavailable: Insufficient historical data for one or more symbols.
Invalid symbols: One or more ticker symbols are not recognized.
usage: Provide list of asset symbols and analysis period. Optionally set correlation_threshold to identify highly correlated asset pairs that may reduce diversification benefits.

correlation_matrix.description: Correlation matrix values in row-major format

high_correlations.description: Asset pairs with correlations above threshold
